source.title: Treatise on the letters
source.annotator: Katie Sykes (79 sentences) and Hanne Eckhoff (1 sentence)
source.electronic-text-version: Digitised from facsimile of the Lavrent'evskij sbornik manuscript (1348) found at http://nlr.ru/manuscripts/fondy/o-fonde/2-article/10306-sdr-yuzhno-slavyanskie All diacritics removed and supralinears taken down. <ѕ> is used to represent both <ѕ> (only used for the numeral) and <ꙃ> (elsewhere). The tokenisation largely follows the edition in Konstantin Kalajdovič (1824): Ioann eksarch bolgarskij, Moscow.
